cloud-header.label: RM-4://(OMNINET UPLINK ID)
cloud-header.vaultID: Load from your Comp/Con account (if logged in)

statusIconsConfig.menu-hint: Configure the status icons that appear on the token HUD
statusIconsConfig.defaultConditionsStatus-desc: Enable the default icon set for conditions & status
statusIconsConfig.cancerConditionsStatus-desc: Enable Cancermantis' icon set for conditions & status
statusIconsConfig.cancerNPCTemplates-desc: Enable Cancermantis' icon set for NPC templates
statusIconsConfig.hayleyConditionsStatus-desc: Enable Hayley's icon set for conditions & status
statusIconsConfig.hayleyPC-desc: Enable Hayley's icon set for PC system effects
statusIconsConfig.hayleyNPC-desc: Enable Hayley's icon set for NPC system effects
statusIconsConfig.hayleyUtility-desc: Enable Hayley's icon set for utility indicators
statusIconsConfig.tommyConditionsStatus-desc: Enable Tommy's icon set for conditions & status

automation.menu-hint: Set up what system automation options are enabled, or turn them all off
automation.master-switch-desc: Turn this off to do everything manually
automation.attacks-desc: Toggle for whether or not you want the system to auto-calculate hits, damage, and other attack related checks.
automation.structure-desc: Automatically prompt for a structure or stress roll when a mech reaches 0 hp or exceeds its heat cap.
automation.overcharge_heat-desc: Automatically apply heat when rolling overcharge
automation.attack_self_heat-desc: When a weapon has the Overkill or Heat (self) tags, automatically apply any heat.
automation.remove_templates-desc: When the turn changes, should measured templates from attacks be cleared?
automation.limited_loading-desc: When items are used, should their limited and loading status be automatically managed and tracked?

actionTracker.menu-hint: Configure options related to action tracker HUD and automations.
actionTracker.showHotbar-desc: Toggles the display of the floating hotbar during combat.
actionTracker.allowPlayers-desc: Allows players to modify their own actions.
actionTracker.printMessages-desc: Prints chat messages for start and end of a token's turn.

initiative.sorttracker-desc: Moves the unit currently taking their turn to the top of the tracker and moves units that have taken their turn to the end of the tracker.
initiative.appearancesettings-desc: Configure the colors and icon used in the tracker

squaregriddiagonals.name: Square Grid Diagonal Movement
squaregriddiagonals.hint: How distances will be calculated when moving diagonally on a square grid.
squaregriddiagonals.121: 1-2-1: Diagonal moves alternate cost from 1 to 2

LANCERINITIATIVE.IconDesc: CSS classes to define the activation icon.
LANCERINITIATIVE.ActivatedLastDesc: Moves units that have taken their turn to the end of the tracker.
LANCERINITIATIVE.SortTrackerDesc: Moves the unit currently taking their turn to the top of the tracker and moves units that have taken their turn to the end of the tracker.
LANCERINITIATIVE.EnableInitiativeDesc: Adds a button to owned combatants for rolling initiative
